job_tasks.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes leading a team and coordinating resources to demonstrate a product's value, which aligns with the integration and delivery aspects of software, even if it's a sales-oriented demonstration.

job_tasks.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical guidance and answering questions about solutions relates to the integration and understanding of how software solutions work and are presented.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding sales processes, marketing campaigns, and strategic activities to build the sales pipeline, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_tasks.justification: Reporting on activities for forecasting and participating in go-to-market (GTM) programs and departmental activities are directly related to business strategy and understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
soft_skills.justification: Providing technical guidance and answering questions to a customer's technical team is a clear example of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution
soft_skills.justification: Working with marketing and partners on campaign design and execution requires strong collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions
soft_skills.justification: Actively participating in development activities to expand knowledge and skills with new releases and programs demonstrates a commitment to learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
soft_skills.justification: Leading a team to prove product value and outperforming competitors implies taking ownership and driving a specific outcome.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a 'Sales Engineer' role. The tasks primarily involve demonstrating a product, providing technical guidance to customers in a sales context, and participating in sales and marketing activities. There are no tasks related to core software engineering (Macro-Category A) or AI specialization (Macro-Category B) as defined in the coding book. The role is focused on sales enablement rather than building or integrating AI/ML models.

confidence.reasoning: The job title 'Sales Engineer' and the described responsibilities clearly indicate a role focused on sales support and product demonstration, not on AI/ML development or integration. The tasks are distinct from the core software engineering and AI specialization categories, making the 'Not Relevant' profile assignment highly confident.
